description: This file defines a Button UI component using the LightningJS framework. It includes a template for rendering an Element with text content that toggles between two states when the enter input is received. It manages internal state for favorite toggling.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A button component that toggles its 'favorited' state and displayed text when Enter is pressed.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the Enter input event by toggling the 'isFavorited' state.
